body: Amazing how even after this dropped, so many guys still defended Chitose and were angry that he wasn't "fighting" for the little slut.

bitch just went with the flow and put a condom with her mouth just 'cause the other chick told her lmao. Poor mc, dude probably was coming up with some 300iq confession plan when all he needed was tell her to suck him off.

Does it really just take 1 "Please! Chitose!" (page 32) for someone to agree to put on a condom on your dick? couldn't she just refuse it. Doesn't this show how easy of a girl Chitose is 
100% agree with @Kami Nana  Hori should have just walked out on her HERE
How She has not been raped until now is just for the plot of the story
Bruh I thought it was a shojo manga
Hey author. Your works hurts me bad but whatever, the art, especially the art is just amazing. The story is also good. Also did I tell you how I really like your art style and character designs?

MC definitely should have moved on here. This showed him that Chitose was an easy bitch and she didn't care for him that much. He should have just walked out the door the moment she said "okay". Staying and watching that shit was pathetic.
@Aldyn It's called being shellshocked, you fucking idiot. He never expected her to just stupidly go along with it.

@mankodestroyer420 She's not "his girl"...she's her own girl and she did it on her own. @Mack72341 The last chapter shows Taka knew the whole time that there was something between Hori and Chitose when he asked the former if the latter's blowjobs have gotten better. He knew they liked each other so assumed they'd already done sexual things.
@Reyas lol Pages show how they grew up together like the common shit you see in Osananajimi stories and you're trying to say they're not what they obviously are. lmao

There's NTR and then there's whatever this  is. They're just acquaintances, not even osananajimi. The other guy isn't even an asshole, he even asks MC if he's interested in any girls right now but MC says no. I have no idea where the story could possibly go from here and still make sense, especially with Chitose randomly deciding to suck off some guy for no real reason. She's already corrupted, it's over
what a fucking beta, just letting his girl swallow random dick like it's nothing
At least he should have expressed what he feels about chitose to that guy lol.. well i already read the chapters but i just wanna reread again since the latest chapter just came out
This is what I mean a fucking naif and retarded MC, if I am on there I would have already cut the fucking man who fuck my girls asshole, Don't be a fucking coward asshole
Even though the story and plot makes no sense this is still a gold for me

im afraid this similiar situation could happen to me
Shit went from 1 to 100 real quick.
what a cuck lmao

All is good, good art. 10/10 would like to be traumatized again
@zio241 Chitose has her own mouth and let everything happen. Why should Hori stop it? Did you see Chitose stop Taka's sister from fucking Hori? Why does she get a pass?

This guy fucking pisses me off. I'm not into NTR in the first place, so I usually root for the MC to get the girl in the end, but this guy... If he's fucking dumb enough to stand there and watch the girl who clearly likes him get fucked in front of him, for 4+ chapters of this thing, without doing or saying a thing about it, then at that point he's just a fucking moron asking for it to happen.
That succ was sum goddess type succ. Stttyyyuuuuupid tekkers 🔥🔥
Chitose bad, Mika good :D
bruh

I feel like the MC fault if the if crush get taken aways by the other guy  because I think the Chad seem like he would respect him if the MC had feeling for her or going out with her.I don't feel bad for the MC because he should had told the Chad he like,it seem like he would follow bro-code because he act him before he was going to shoot his shot.

The chad was asking if MC had any feelings for her and that dumbass basically said he didn't see her like a woman but at the same time she didn't even think about MC's feelings after being together for so long. Meh, long story short, Mika best girl
I'm feeling conflicting emotions.
This isn't an usual cuckold mc, it'll be fresh plot I assume
I forgot...I was reading hentia...till they pulled out the condoms..

Ahhh to where it all began....  I mean it is ntr since the guy has feelings for her but waits too long and she falls in love with someone else (that's the harsh truth) me on the other hand prefer Mika<3, also props to the MC for handling it well hes not some creeper or broken inside by them f**king hes just like f**k it imma head home and see her again 2morrow lol really hope ma boi Hori gets a happy ending with Mika 🤞🤞

It's not fucking ntr dude he never confessed to her they were never in a relationship how the fuck is this ntr?

This happened to me. There was a girl in my class that I had a crush on for 8 years, but I was to scarred and stupid to confess, than some random dude showed up and they've been dating ever since. One problem is that they would  break up and make up a lot and they complain about each other to anyone in class. So moral of the story, don't be an idiot like me and confess to that girl you really (even thought this didn't work either)
